title: Christians Are Being Gas Lit - Mark LeFebvre
description:
Please Share This With Other Christians!

To hear the full conversation go to
https://youtu.be/2v-gSe9yDwQ

Check out Marks conversation with Karen Wong on the meaning code
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=chybRUqE2_A&t=3s

Like and Subscribe to Marks Channel
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgIbaWd7raqeIGUS1cHNgPg/featured

The first of the three RTNAR talks on AFtMC: https://youtu.be/J2yepV8_NxI

Join the conversation on The Meaning Crisis Discord: https://discord.gg/WBvRK3EtRu
